title: great experience at the Allerton
text: My husband and I stayed 5 nights at the Allerton and it has been a great experience, the staff has been very nice and helpful, they upgraded us to a suite, which was grand, the bed was absolutely very confortable.The location is just perfect, in the middle of Magnificent Mile, were all the shops are and very close to everything. I would definitely reccomend this hotel for a nice stay in Chicago.
